_meanings:
{@--7@} A
minute division of time (=the
sixth part of a twinkling).

{@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of a son of
Rāma, one of the twins, the other
being Kuśa <ab>q. v.</ab> He with his
brother was brought up by the
sage Vālmīki, and they were
taught by the poet to repeat his
Rāmāyaṇa at assemblies &c.; (for
the derivation of his name, see  
<ls>R. 15. 32</ls>).

A
little; {#lavamapi lavaMge na ramate#} Sar.
<ls>K. 1.</ls>
